subcategory_lists.title: Exploration and Mining
subcategory_lists.description: Companies engaged in the mining of disruptive materials and providing related services, including exploration and mineral extraction projects
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 파괴적 물질 채굴 및 관련 서비스에 참여하는 회사, 탐사 및 광물 추출 프로젝트 등의 제공

subcategory_lists.title: Production of Disruptive Materials
subcategory_lists.description: Companies active in themanufacturing, processing and trading of disruptive materials for primary usage and directly related products
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 주로 혁신적인 재료의 제조, 가공 및 거래에 종사하는 기업들

subcategory_lists.title: Enhancements of Disruptive Materials
subcategory_lists.description: Companies that are refining, developing and smelting materials to extract and purify disruptive materials
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 기술적 소재 추출, 정제 및 제련에 전문화된 회사들

subcategory_lists.title: Enterprise Video and Chat Communication Platforms
subcategory_lists.description: Includes companies that provide cloud-based platforms, which enable online communication such as voice, video and messaging for end-users
subcategory_lists.title_kr: 기업용 비디오 및 채팅 커뮤니케이션 플랫폼
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 클라우드 플랫폼을 제공하는 기업들로 구성되어 있으며, 음성, 영상 및 메시징을 통한 온라인 커뮤니케이션을 가능하게 함
